items.key: (@@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)) and status = '1'
items.check: @@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)

command.text:
if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'hrEmployeeRequestingForSIBookInput', 'New') = 0 return
declare @ref varchar(512) select @ref = rtrim(bp_ref) + '%' from hrbp where ma_bp = @bo_phan
insert into hrdncbh (dot, ky, nam, stt_rec, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select @dot, @ky, @nam, a.stt_rec, getdate(), getdate(), @@userID, @@userID from hrnv a left join hrttbh b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where a.bp_ref like @ref and (a.ngay_chinh_thuc between @ngay_ct_tu and @ngay_ct_den) and (isnull(b.si_no, '') = '' or isnull(b.hi_no, '') = '') and a.stt_rec not in (select stt_rec from hrdncbh where nam = @nam and ky = @ky and dot = @dot)

action.text: if exists(select 1 from hrbp where ma_bp = @bo_phan) begin select bp_ref from hrbp where ma_bp = @bo_phan return end
